betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThis gate counts redstone pulses, and lets you do arithmetic!

Right click the gate to change its settings.

The side with a redstone channel and a plus sign will add a configurable amount to the block state.

The side with a redstone channel and a minus sign will subtract a configurable amount to the block state.

When the state is zero, the gate will output a redstone signal from the zero side, the side with a redstone torch and a minus sign.

When the state reaches a maximum, the gate will output a redstone signal from the max side, the side with a redstone torch and a plus sign.
